title: Can anyone help with these numbers?
content:
Hi  
Can anyone help me identify the font used in these numbers please? I'm really struggling with this one!  
Many thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [5-rating-crop numbers.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014074304/http:/typophile.com/files/5-rating-crop%20numbers_0.jpg) | 65.23 KB |
author: littlejen74

comments.content:
It looks like **[Avenir Heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014074304/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Avenir%20-%20Heavy&fid=a18aff1363391533e205c2ae65649bba&fsize=60&text=012345&fit=1)** with modified /3 & /5 digits.  
For /3 & /5 you can also try **[Gautami (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014074304/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=MS-Windows-Fonts&ffam=Gautami%20-%20Bold&fid=1cb82c6f93c51aa8dd7c7ea82cd641eb&fsize=60&text=012345&fit=1)** a font distributed with Microsoft Windows 7/8 to support the Indic script-Telugu  
More on Gautami:  
 [http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/family.aspx?FID=238](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014074304/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/family.aspx?FID=238 "http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/family.aspx?FID=238")

------------------  
I found them using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20141014074304/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
